properties.title: Little Pomona
properties.address: Order online at littlepomona.com or visit Brook House Farm, Avenbury Ln, Bromyard, HR7 4LB
properties.description: Voted 2019 Cider Producer of the Year by the Hereford Times, Susanna and James Forbes are renowned for using the very best fruit and natural methods. Visit them and try their ciders in their tasting room.

properties.title: Pilton Cider
properties.description: Artisan producers at the heart of Somerset's cider-land making whole juice sparking cider by the English method of Keeving.

properties.title: FIND & FOSTER
properties.description: Working with local farmers to help breathe life back into traditional orchards on their farms; to prevent further decline and the extinction of important local apple varieties.

properties.title: Jolter Press
properties.description: ‘A bloke in a shed. Similar looking bloke in an orchard. The same bloke later on behind the bar. Autumn on autopilot. A cast of thousands.’

properties.title: Gregg’s Pit Cider & Perry
properties.address: View stockists online at greggs-pit.co.uk
properties.description: Established in 1994, Gregg’s Pit make craft cider and perry from 100% juice of vintage fruit harvested from traditional standard Herefordshire orchards.

properties.title: Butford Organics
properties.address: Order online at Butfordorganics.co.uk/online-shop/ or visit Butford Organics, Butford Farm, Bowley Lane, Bodenham, Herefordshire, HR1 3LG
properties.description: Herefordshire is the home of the cider apple and perry pear, and at Butford Farm they’re continuing the tradition of quality cider and perry production.

properties.title: Once Upon a Tree
properties.description: Herefordshire cider made by a wine maker - a mixture of traditional ciders and innovative ciders using wine making principles.

properties.title: Newton Court Cider
properties.description: Newton Court Cider is part of an 157 acre certified organic farm with 30 acres of cider apple and perry pear orchards. They are proud to make award winning ciders and Perries using fruit from their own orchards or from friends in Herefordshire.

properties.title: Ross on Wye Cider & Perry Co
properties.description: ‘Ross’ make a huge range of ciders and perrys, including a number of single varieties as well as blends.

properties.title: Fletchers Cider
properties.description: A family run craft cider producer based in the heart of the Worcestershire countryside. The Fletcher family started planting orchards with traditional cider apple varieties over 14 years ago, and now use mainly their own apples.

properties.title: Wilce’s Cider
properties.description: A 6th generation family cider maker in Herefordshire. They have over 34 Herefordshire cider varieties that they use in their blends.

properties.title: Oliver’s Fine Cider & Perry
properties.description: Oliver’s make a selection of fine Herefordshire ciders and perries with an emphasis on balance and character coupled with drinkability.

properties.title: West Milton Cider Co
properties.description: They stick to the same time honoured principles – select the best apples from the best orchards, mill them, squeeze them, put them in a barrel and let the magic happen. All of their ciders use a natural fermentation with no added sulphites or chemicals.

properties.title: Sheppy’s
properties.description: One of the oldest cider making families in the world. You can visit their ‘House of Cider’ to learn how their cider is made and pick up some bottles.

properties.title: Sandford Orchards
properties.description: Founded in 2002 - they’re based in the oldest working cider mill in the UK.

properties.title: The Somerset Cider Brandy Company
properties.description: Producers of both cider and cider brandy - their farm sits in  180 acres of cider apple orchards. They also make award winning liqueurs using the same cider apples. Their cider brand is ‘Burrow Hill’.

properties.title: Polgoon
properties.address: Order online at polgoon.com/ or visit for a tour and tasting.
properties.description: Polgoon is dedicated to producing a range of artisan Cornish wines, ciders and juices on the family-run vineyard and orchard.
